name: Ghosts of Aliens
storyline: Ghosts of Aliens is a short(Probably 5 hours) role playing rpg game that follows the adventures of Atum and an old man named Gwaldin, and later 3 other heroes. On October 1st, 1963, an alien ship crashes on the planet of Appalathia, in a desert near the town of Roswell. For 5 years, the alien inside this ship lives off of rations and eventually dies becoming the ghost of an alien. Gwaldin, the old man, tells of a prophecy that a hero would crash from the sky down to the world of Appalathia and defeat the 5 Doom Beasts that are scattered across the world.
summary: An RPG maker game in the style of mother 1 by swordofkings128
